page.title: 14Sunday 9th June,1985-Meltham
page.content: I{woke}up at{6.00 a.m.}I went downstairs with my mum and then my dad came down and put the{radio}on. About half an hour later we put{television on. Then my sister and brother came down and we watched Rub a Dub Tub. Then my mum did some washing in the {washing machine.}Next I had some breakfast, I had{Rice Crispies}and then I put the{computer}on. First I played Jumping Jack and then Pool, then I tried loading Ghostbusters but it wouldn't load. I did not have any lunch so I played Pool again and then I had my tea. I had{gammon, broad {beans, carrots}and{rice pudding.}Then I watched Chips and Football, after that, at{9.00 p.m.}I went to{bed.
